timeline.message:
add step to keep core dumps from AT

Signed-off-by: Sally MacFarlane <sally.macfarlane@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                      path: /home/circleci/project/acceptance-tests/tests/core.*
          
          
            
                      path: /home/circleci/project/acceptance-tests/tests/hs_err_pid.*
          
      
    
    
  

Core dumps are hard to read, the log is more human readable:
/home/circleci/project/acceptance-tests/tests/hs_err_pid632.log is a representative variant.
timeline.author: shemnon
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,6 +62,9 @@ commands:
       - store_artifacts:
           path: acceptance-tests/tests/build/acceptanceTestLogs
           destination: acceptance-tests-logs
+      - store_artifacts:
+          path: /home/circleci/project/acceptance-tests/tests/core.*

timeline.message:
capture hs_err_pid file

Signed-off-by: Sally MacFarlane <sally.macfarlane@consensys.net>
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/hyperledger/besu into core-dump-capture-ci
